name: Linking Thredd
description:
Description

Thredd, a friendly robot, learns new tricks from a companion. This is Thredd's journey to send a thank you message to that companion. The only problem is: Thredd's computer is DISCONNECTED. Can you help Thredd find his way and deliver the message?

Controls Control
Primary Secondary Move
ADRight and Left Arrow Keys JumpWUp Arrow KeyShoot Space Bar Melee AttackLeft/Right Shift PauseEsc Meet the Team
